name: Elaine Chao
summary: Former Transportation Secretary and wife of Mitch McConnell who resigned after January 6, calling the attack 'entirely avoidable' and condemning Trump's role.

keyStatements.quote: Yesterday, our country experienced a traumatic and entirely avoidable event as supporters of the President stormed the Capitol building following a rally he addressed. As I'm sure is the case with many of you, it has deeply troubled me in a way that I simply cannot set aside.
It has been the honor of a lifetime to serve the U.S. Department of Transportation.

timeline.event: Secretary of Labor under George W. Bush

timeline.significance: First cabinet member to resign after attack

credibility.background: Former Transportation Secretary, former Labor Secretary, first Asian-American woman in Cabinet

oppositionReasons: Trump's role in the attack was deeply troubling
Trump's actions violated oath of office
Could not continue serving after January 6
